urls.title: Home | Tony's Towing Trivia
urls.description: Sadly, not all of it is true. The problem is sorting fact from fiction and mere opinions. Hopefully, in these pages, I can help sort the wheat from the chaff, the truth from misinformation and hearsay, and bust a few myths along the way. Although still an active tower and motorhome user, I have no connexion or affiliations with any companies or organisations. My primary concern is Safe & Legal towing. My experience relates specifically to cat01 and 02 trailers. Cat01 trailers are unbraked, up tp 750kgs

urls.title: Regenerative Agriculture Podcast: Reversing Soil Degradation with Dwayne Beck
urls.description: Dr. Dwayne Beck is well known for being one of the pioneers of no-till agriculture in central South Dakota and across the High Plains. For more than three decades, Dr. Beck has been creating comprehensive systems for both irrigated and dryland crop production throughout the region, educating growers on the power of crop rotation, diversity, and other regenerative practices. He currently serves as the Research Manager at the Dakota Lakes Research Farm, a non-profit made up of farmers committed to sustainable land practices. On today‚Äôs episode, John and Dwayne discuss: Dwayne‚Äôs background and his earlier work assisting local growers with their irrigation systems The continuing decline of the Ogallala Aquifer and how water infiltration can be improved by implementing no-till agricultural practices.
